channel.title: Comments on: Parnassus Library Entrance Redesign Project

item.title: By: Tyrone Mccloskey
item.dc:creator: Tyrone Mccloskey
item.description: The sooner the access services staff know what the new hours will be, the better. Thanks-
item.content:encoded:
The sooner the access services staff know what the new hours will be, the better.
Thanks-

item.title: By: Mary Tahir
item.dc:creator: Mary Tahir
item.description: It's my understanding that because we receive State funding, we serve the constituents of the State. This doesn't necessarily mean we have to provide the same level of service we provide to our primary clientele. UCB has some libraries that are closed to the public; and certain resources are restricted due to licensing contracts.
item.content:encoded: It’s my understanding that because we receive State funding, we serve the constituents of the State. This doesn’t necessarily mean we have to provide the same level of service we provide to our primary clientele. UCB has some libraries that are closed to the public; and certain resources are restricted due to licensing contracts.

item.title: By: Sean Mcclelland
item.dc:creator: Sean Mcclelland
item.description: I hear some people say that we're obligated by law to provide certain services to the public. Is that true, because we're not a private university? Just curious. And good luck with this project!
item.content:encoded: I hear some people say that we’re obligated by law to provide certain services to the public. Is that true, because we’re not a private university? Just curious. And good luck with this project!
